item.title: Using python in textmate
item.description: Using python in textmate. Python in TextMate 2 TextMate will parse the first line of your Python script for a shebang sequence. ... If found, it will attempt to call that interpreter when you run your script. I have installed Python 3 using homebrew, so the binary is in my /usr/local/bin folder. Lets set up a simple script and test this: #!/usr/local/bin/python3 print('hello, hypepat!') .tm_properties TM_PYTHON = "${CWD}/venv/bin/python" excludeDirectoriesInBrowser = "{__pycache__,include,lib,bin}" includeFilesInBrowser = "{.gitignore}" [ source.
